EmailTemplate.description: StarTrack Credit Dispute Email Template to ask user to provide further information.
EmailTemplate.name: Provide Further Information
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Case.Subject}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Case No.: {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear Customer,
Thank you for your enquiry. In order for us to further investigate your request, we need some additional information.
Please provide us with the following details: 1. Account Name 2. StarTrack Account Number 3. Contact Name and preferred phone number or email address 4. Consignment Note number/s 5. Reason for your claim 6. Amount you're claiming 7. Attach any supporting documentation pertinent to your enquiry, e.g. Picking/Packing slip, photos of sent items, customer purchase order...
Did you know that we now have an online form for easy capture of your claim details? Please visit https://forms.startrack.com.au/tools/credit-claim to lodge any future credit enquiries.
Regards,
Customer Resolution Team StarTrack
